column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Definitely make reservations here - when we checked in for our 8:30 reservation
column2: the wait was over two hours without one. Sangria (the red variety
column4: with maybe a bit too much brandy; the cava
column6: was delicious and I could drink pitchers of it. The tapas here are good
column7: but I think Emilio's are better
column8: particularly the goat cheese and tomato sauce (my favorite) and the ham and cheese croquettes. The one major standout here is the short ribs
column9: which come with the most amazing manchego cheese mashed potatoes.
